      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Instead of using the Firewall's routing decision Match, which might be as general as "in_port" and inadvertently Match packets erroneously, construct a more specific Match based on the deserialized OFPacketIn's payload, which has been placed in the FloodlightContext already by the Controller.

      Creates a OFPacketOut with the OFPacketIn data that is flooded on all ports unless the port is blocked, in which case the packet will be dropped.
